name: Icon Grid Maker
description:
This is a simple plugin that allows you to create icon library.


  1. Drag and drop SVG icons into file
  2. Select them
  3. Run the plugin
  4. BOOM grid
  5. At this point you can clean up the structure of every icon and apply color styles


Video tutorial

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jn_gEG_IxlY
